##fix the missing data

```{r}
read_csv("data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("NA", ".", ""))
```

## IMport Pups Data

```{r}
pups_df =
  read_csv("data_import_examples/FAS_pups.csv",
           skip = 3,
          na = c("NA", ".", "")
          )

pups_df = 
  janitor::clean_names(pups_df)
```
